name: GraphqlSchemaComperator
author: Atle Esperum
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory when GraphqlSchemaComperator is run.

inputs.name: oldSchema
inputs.label: Path to the old schema
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of the file with the old schema

inputs.name: newSchema
inputs.label: Path to the new schema
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of the file with the new schema that should be compared to the old

inputs.name: schemaDiff
inputs.label: Path to the schema diff json output
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of the json output with the shema diff.
